TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: EN CS DA DE ET EL ES FR IT LV LT HR HU MT NL PL PT SK SL FI SV RO GA BG

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI303

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Техническа помощ за подпомагане на изпълнението на операцията „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“
EIB - Technická pomoc na podporu realizace operace „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“
EIB - Teknisk bistand til støtte af gennemførelsen af aktiviteten "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan"
EIB - Technische Hilfe bei der Durchführung der Operation „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“
ΕΤΕπ - Τεχνική βοήθεια για την υλοποίηση της πράξης "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan"
EIB - Technical assistance to support the implementation of the "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan" operation
BEI - Asistencia técnica para la realización de la operación «Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan»
EIP - Tehniline abi tegevuse „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“ rakendamise toetamiseks
EIP - Tekninen tuki ”Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan” -hankkeen toteuttamiseksi
BEI - Assistance technique à la mise en oeuvre de l’opération « Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan»
BEI - Technical assistance to support the implementation of the "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan" operation
EIB - Tehnička pomoć za pružanje podrške provedbi aktivnosti „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan”
EBB - A „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan” művelet kivitelezésének támogatása céljából biztosított szakmai segítségnyújtás
BEI - Assistenza tecnica alla realizzazione dell’operazione « Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan »
EIB - Techninė pagalba veiklos „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“ įgyvendinimui
EIB - Tehniskā palīdzība ar mērķi atbalstīt darbības “Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan” ieviešanu
BEI - Għajnuna teknika biex tappoġġja l-implimentazzjoni tal operazzjoni "Ukraine Agrifood APEX Loan"
EIB - Technische bijstand ter ondersteuning van de tenuitvoerlegging van de operatie "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan"
EBI - Pomoc techniczna dla wsparcia wdrażania operacji pod nazwą „Pożyczka rolnospożywcza APEX dla Ukrainy” („Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan”)
BEI - Assistência técnica para apoiar a implementação da operação "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan"
BEI - Asistență tehnică în vederea susținerii implementării operațiunii „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan”
EIB - Odborná pomoc pre podporu realizácie operácie „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“
EIB - Tehnična pomoč za podporo izvajanja operacije „Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan“
EIB - Tekniskt bistånd till stöd för genomförandet av operationen ”Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan”

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Technical assistance to support the implementation of the "Ukraine Agri-food APEX Loan" operation (LU-Luxembourg)

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Publication date of the procurement notice

TXT_MARK.P: Not applicable.
Restricted international tender
7 (seven)
1. AFC GmbH (DE) in consortium with Akademie Deutscher Genossenschaften e.V. (ADG) (DE), Hulla and Co. Human Dynamics KG (HD) (AT) and IAK Agrar Consulting GmbH (DE)
2. Deloitte Tax and Consulting (LU) in consortium with Deloitte (UA), GIZ (DE) and Easy Business (UA)
3. Diadkasia Business Consulting (GR) in consortium with Vakakis and Associates S.A. (GR), Agrotec SpA (IT) and Avensa Consulting Ltd (RO)
4. Frankfurt School of Finance and Management (DE) in consortium with AquaBioTech Limited (MT) and EandY Limited Liability Company (UA)
5. GFA Consulting Group GmbH (DE) in consortium with IPC – Internationale Projekt Consult GmbH (DE), HCL (CY) and Ukr AgroConsult (UA)
6. NIRAS A/S (DK) in consortium with Agriconsulting Europe SA (BE), TA Consult Partners Ltd (UK) and Unicon (UK)

BLK_BTX_SEQ.P: Any tenders received from tenderers comprising legal entities other than those mentioned in the short-listed application forms will be excluded from this restricted tender procedure. Short-listed candidates may not form alliances or subcontract to each other for the contract in question.
